![](https://cdn.fulltimehosting.net/logo_black.png "")


_Full Time Hosting (FTH) was founded in 2016. Our main goal is to provide cheap Anti-DDoS GAME servers with 99.9% uptime and we focus on providing the best customer service. Our company is customer-focused and every decision is made keeping our beloved customers in mind. We started off our company as a hobby and we don’t focus on earning “profit” and we like to work at the break-even. Since this was started as a hobby, we re-invest the “surplus” amount to provide the best products and services to our customers._

____________________________________________________________________________________________

Hello LET!
